title: Untapped Rally
summary: All Rally America, all the time.
description: All Rally America, all the time.Untapped Rally keeps you up to date with all the latest news and results on the go. View schedules, itineraries, stage times, and oh-so-much MOAR!Never miss an event again, thanks to our convenient notifications as well as the countdown to the start of the next rally featured on the main screen.Permission Details:USB storage - Used to cache imagesRun at startup - Used to keep widget updatedControl vibration - Used for notificationsThis app is NOT affiliated with, maintained, authorized, endorsed, or sponsored by Rally America, Inc. in any way either expressed or implied.
descriptionHTML:
All Rally America, all the time.

Untapped Rally keeps you up to date with all the latest news and results on the go. View schedules, itineraries, stage times, and oh-so-much MOAR!

Never miss an event again, thanks to our convenient notifications as well as the countdown to the start of the next rally featured on the main screen.

Permission Details:
USB storage - Used to cache images
Run at startup - Used to keep widget updated
Control vibration - Used for notifications

This app is NOT affiliated with, maintained, authorized, endorsed, or sponsored by Rally America, Inc. in any way either expressed or implied.
comments: Excellent app Well made and functional, pretty much what I'd imagine a Rally America app to be. Thanks to the developer for putting the time into this.
Top app design! This app looks well thought out.  The details included are all I could ever want in a Rally America like app.
